page.title: 19EVENTS-TORNADO HITS GOTHAM.
page.content: Trees were uprooted or broken off and carried across the fields outside the village.There was danger from escaping gas and the Gas Board had to do emergency repairs.A man who had bought a new car only that week found it scratched and battered by falling debris.People had to be evacuated from their homes until they could be made safe.One old lady had a lucky escape.She normally went to bed early, but for some reason had delayed on Thursday. The tornado caused the ceiling of her bedroom to collapse and her bed was completely covered in bricks and rubble.
